# uni-tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                              | Type                                     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `arrow`     | `arrow`      | Whether to display an arrow pointing from the tooltip bubble             | `boolean`                                | `true`      |
| `hideDelay` | `hide-delay` | Delay before hiding the tooltip after mouseleave/blur                    | `number`                                 | `300`       |
| `position`  | `position`   | Which side to position the tooltip on                                    | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `'right'`   |
| `text`      | `text`       | Text content to display inside the tooltip. Overrides the `content` slot | `string \| undefined`                    | `undefined` |
| `useFocus`  | `use-focus`  | Control whether the tooltip shows on focus                               | `boolean`                                | `true`      |
| `useHover`  | `use-hover`  | Control whether the tooltip shows on hover                               | `boolean`                                | `true`      |
| `value`     | `value`      | Programmatically show the tooltip                                        | `boolean \| undefined`                   | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                 | Description                  |
| -------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `--uni-border-color` | Color for the tooltip border |
